content: Hello! Thanks for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, the virtual assistant. I'll help you schedule your home service today. May I get your full name to start?
Thank you, Marissa! Can you please provide the address where you'd like us to do the work?
Perfect, thanks! What type of service do you need help with today? (Plumbing, electrical, or HVAC?)
Got it! Could you let me know your preferred date and time for the HVAC service?
Tomorrow morning, as early as possible.
Thank you! Let me check our earliest availability for tomorrow morning.
I'm sorry, I'm having trouble accessing our scheduling system at the moment. I'm transferring you to a human team member who can assist you further.
reason: AI unable to check calendar due to system error.

content: Hi Marissa, this is Angela from XYZ Home Services. Sorry for the delay—our system was briefly down. I see you need HVAC service for your AC tomorrow morning at 1712 Corley Ln in Brentview. I can confirm we have an opening between 8-10 AM tomorrow. Would that work for you?
Yes, that time works. Please book it.

Fantastic, you’re all set for tomorrow between 8-10 AM. Our technician will text you before arrival. If you have any other questions or need to reschedule, reply here. Thank you for choosing XYZ Home Services. See you tomorrow!
reason: Appointment successfully scheduled by human operator after AI system error.
